allow: Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clinical.visits;")
Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U crm_user -d fondazione_crm -c "\d auth.users")
Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT id, nome, cognome, is_active FROM patient.patients ORDER BY id;")
Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT id, name, description FROM auth.roles ORDER BY id;")
